name: PWGen

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms allow-popups allow-modals; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; child-src 'self';

description: A browser extension for generating passwords using Rust and SHA-256 hashing.
